title: 3 and Out - Jalen Ramsey Value; Move on From Mariota; Dallas/Dak Waiting Game; Eli's a HOF'er; Week 3 Preview; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Jalen Ramsey Value; Move on From Mariota; Dallas/Dak Waiting Game; Eli's a HOF'er; Week 3 Preview; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff explains why the Jags should ride out the Jalen Ramsey drama, why it's clear Marcus Mariota isn't the long-term answer in Tennessee, why the Cowboys will end up paying more for waiting to pay Dak, why Eli Manning is a Hall of Famer. He also previews all of the NFL Week 3 games and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
